about.details:
Incorporated in 1995, Keystone Realtors Limited is one of the prominent real estate developer. The company is engaged primarily in the business of real estate construction, development and other related activities in India.

As of June 30, 2022, the company had 32 Completed Projects, 12 Ongoing Projects and 21 Forthcoming Projects across the Mumbai Metropolitan Region ("MMR") that includes a comprehensive range of projects under the affordable, mid and mass, aspirational, premium and super premium categories, all under the Rustomjee brand.

June 30, 2022, Keystone Realtors have developed 20.22 million square feet of high-value and affordable residential buildings, premium gated estates, townships, corporate parks, retail spaces, schools, iconic landmarks and various other real estate projects.

As part of the business model, the company is entering into joint development agreements, redevelopment agreements with landowners or developers or societies, and slum rehabilitation projects, which requires lower upfront capital investment compared to direct acquisition of land parcel.

The company have adopted an integrated real estate development model for every stage of the property development life cycle, commencing from business development, which involves the identification of land parcels and the conceptualization of the development, to execution, comprising planning, designing and overseeing the construction activities, marketing and sales.

As of June 30, 2022, The company have developed over 280 buildings and homes for over 14,000 families.

contactDetails.full_address: Keystone Realtors Limited, 702 Natraj MV Road Junction, Western Express Highway, Andheri (East)

faqs.question: What is the Keystone Realtors IPO?
faqs.answer:
Keystone Realtors IPO is a main-board IPO of 11737523 equity shares of the face value of ₹10 aggregating up to ₹635.00 Crores. The issue is priced at ₹541 per share. The minimum order quantity is 27.

The IPO opens on November 14, 2022, and closes on November 16, 2022.

Link Intime India Private Ltd is the registrar for the IPO. The shares are proposed to be listed on BSE, NSE.

faqs.question: How to apply in Keystone Realtors IPO through Zerodha?
faqs.answer:
Zerodha customers can apply online in Keystone Realtors IPO using UPI as a payment gateway. Zerodha customers can apply in Keystone Realtors IPO by login into Zerodha Console (back office) and submitting an IPO application form.

Steps to apply in Keystone Realtors IPO through Zerodha

  1. Visit the Zerodha website and login to Console.
  2. Go to Portfolio and click the IPOs link.
  3. Go to the 'Keystone Realtors IPO' row and click the 'Bid' button.
  4. Enter your UPI ID, Quantity, and Price.
  5. Submit IPO application form.
  6. Visit the UPI App (net banking or BHIM) to approve the mandate.

Visit Zerodha IPO Application Process Review for more detail.

faqs.question: When Keystone Realtors IPO will open?
faqs.answer: The Keystone Realtors IPO opens on November 14, 2022 and closes on November 16, 2022.

faqs.question: What is the lot size of Keystone Realtors IPO?
faqs.answer: Keystone Realtors IPO lot size is 27, and the minimum amount required is ₹14,607.

faqs.question: How to apply for Keystone Realtors IPO?
faqs.answer: You can apply in Keystone Realtors IPO online using either UPI or ASBA as a payment method. ASBA IPO application is available in the net banking of your bank account. UPI IPO application is offered by brokers who don't offer banking services. Read more detail about applying IPO online through Zerodha, Upstox, 5Paisa, Nuvama, HDFC Bank, and SBI Bank.

faqs.question: When is Keystone Realtors IPO allotment?
faqs.answer: The finalization of Basis of Allotment for Keystone Realtors IPO will be done on Monday, November 21, 2022, and the allotted shares will be credited to your demat account by Wednesday, November 23, 2022. Check the Keystone Realtors IPO allotment status.

faqs.question: When is Keystone Realtors IPO listing date?
faqs.answer: The Keystone Realtors IPO listing date is on Thursday, November 24, 2022.
